attributes.action: Allow DVLA to restart Motorcycle tests
attributes.additional_details:
There's thousands of people ready for test and the complete cancellation of the test has had a big impact on people plus money due to 
If people wait the 3 months this is also more expense on lessons to keep things fresh for there test date which with everything going on is something to worry about 
Plus most instructors will loose alot of money and business due to people not going for lessons 
So another big impact on small sell employed people 
There's a safe ways to do these tests without cancelling
attributes.background:
To reinstate motorcycle testing 
There is no risk to the public from motorcycle tests as there is the motorcycle gear ie helmets body armour gloves that all would stop the spread plus while being tested your not in the same vehicle and also will be more that 2m away at all times
